Because the symptoms are similar to many conditions that need to be ruled out, the diagnosis make take some time to be made and patients are frequently misunderstood. Those who are affected are typically highly functioning individuals who are ""struck down"" with this disease. There is still no cure for this condition but there are several clinical trial
